doctor.name: Dr. Hossain Mohammad Selim
doctor.info: Dr. Hossain Mohammad Selim is a Homeopathy Doctor in Chittagong. His qualification is DHMS, BHMS (Dhaka), DIHOM (UK). He is a Consultant, Homeopathy at Organon Homoeo Healing Home. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Organon Homoeo Healing Home. Practicing hour of Dr. Hossain Mohammad Selim at Organon Homoeo Healing Home is 10am to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Anjan Kumar Das

doctor.info: Dr. Anjan Kumar Das is a Homeopathic Doctor in Chittagong. His qualification is DHMS (BHB), MBA, Silva Mind Control Graduate. He is a Secretary General at Bangladesh Homoeopathic Parishad, Central Committee. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Jamuna Homoeo Centre. Practicing hour of Dr. Anjan Kumar Das at Jamuna Homoeo Centre is 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Ajay Barua
doctor.specialty: Chronic & Critical Diseases Expert in Homeo & Bio-Chemic MedicinePiles, Gonorrhea, Tumor, Infertility, Kidney Stone, Nasal Polyp,Urine Infection, Prostate Enlarge, Impotency
doctor.info: Dr. Ajay Barua is a highly experienced homeopathic and bio-chemic medicine specialist, holding DHMS and BHB (Dhaka) qualifications. With expertise in managing chronic and critical diseases, he has a deep understanding of conditions such as piles, gonorrhea, tumor, infertility, kidney stone, nasal polyp, urine infection, prostate enlarge, impotency, and other long-term health concerns. As a former Medical Officer at Ma-Moni Homeo Charity Medical Center, Dr. Barua has dedicated years to patient care, using natural and holistic approaches to treatment. He currently practices at Shuvo Homeo Pharmacy, located at 273, Old Church, KC Dey Road, West Laldighi, Chattogram. Patients can consult him daily from 10 AM to 2 PM and 4 PM to 10 PM for expert homeopathic solutions.

chamber.address: 273, Old Church, KC Dey Road, West Laldighi, Chattogram
